title: Admin creates and configures a translation project
description: Verify that an admin user can successfully create a new translation project, configure languages, add team members with roles, and generate API keys.

steps.description: Login as an Admin user
Navigate to the project creation page
Fill in project details including name and default language
Add multiple languages to the project
Add team members with roles: Translator, Reviewer, and Admin
Create and save the project
Confirm the project is created with all specified details
Verify API keys are generated and accessible
Check team members have correct role-based access

title: Translator edits translation with AI assistance and submits draft
description: Validate the translator can access the translation grid, edit translation cells inline, use AI translation suggestions, and submit the translation as a draft.

steps.description: Login as a Translator
Open a configured translation project
Locate a translation key in the grid
Edit the translation inline
Use AI translation assistance and choose a suggested translation
Save changes and submit translation in draft state
Ensure the translation is saved as draft with updated content
Verify AI provider fallback works if the primary AI service fails

title: Reviewer approves and requests changes on translations
description: Check that the reviewer can review submitted translations in draft state, approve or request changes, and trigger notifications.

steps.description: Login as Reviewer
Open a translation project and filter translations needing review
Review a translation in draft state
Approve the translation
Verify the translation status changes to approved
Review another translation and request changes
Confirm the translation is marked for changes and notifications are sent to the translator

title: Translation workflow state transition and audit logging
description: Ensure that translations correctly transition between draft, review, and approved states with accurate history logging including user attribution.

steps.description: Submit a translation as draft
Check translation state is draft and logged in history
Reviewer changes draft to review and then to approved
Verify each state transition appears in audit logs with correct user info
Perform rollback to previous approved version
Confirm rollback is successful and logged

title: File import with validation and preview for supported formats
description: Test importing translation files in JSON, CSV, XLIFF 1.2 and 2.0 formats with successful validation and data preview.

steps.description: Navigate to bulk upload/import page
Upload a valid JSON translation file
Verify the file is parsed and previewed without errors
Repeat upload for CSV, XLIFF 1.2, and XLIFF 2.0 files
Ensure validation errors appear for corrupt or incorrectly formatted files
Approve and import the valid files
Confirm translations are added or updated accordingly

title: Bulk operations on translation keys
description: Verify bulk editing, approvals, and deletions operate correctly on selected translation keys.

steps.description: Select multiple translation keys in the translation grid
Perform bulk approve operation
Check all selected translations change status to approved
Perform bulk edit to update translation texts
Verify all selected translations are updated accordingly
Delete selected translation keys in bulk
Confirm keys are removed from the project

title: Screenshot upload, display, and optimization
description: Test that users can upload screenshots associated with translation keys and verify image optimization and cloud storage functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to screenshot management interface for a translation key
Upload multiple image files with various formats and sizes
Ensure images are uploaded successfully to cloud storage
Verify images display properly in the UI with optimized loading
Delete one screenshot
Confirm the screenshot is deleted from storage and UI

title: Public API translation data fetching with authentication and filtering
description: Check that the RESTful API endpoint returns translation data with proper API key authentication, supports language and namespace filters, and enforces rate limiting.

steps.description: Send API request with valid API key to fetch translations
Confirm translations data is returned with correct filtering based on parameters
Send API request with missing or invalid API key
Verify API returns unauthorized error
Send rapid successive requests to test rate limiting
Ensure API throttles excessive requests and responds with rate limit errors

title: Notification system triggers and displays notifications
description: Validate that notifications are generated and delivered for review requests, translation approvals, @mentions in comments, and queue job updates; notifications appear in-app correctly.

steps.description: As a Reviewer, request changes on a translation
Confirm the Translator receives a notification for the review request
Approve a translation
Verify notification is sent to relevant users
Add a comment with an @mention
Check mentioned user receives notification
Trigger translation queue job update
Ensure notification status updates are reflected in notification center

title: Security tests for unauthorized access and API key misuse
description: Verify robust security mechanisms prevent unauthorized data access, SQL injection, API key enumeration, and enforce organization-based access restrictions.

steps.description: Attempt to access project data without authentication
Verify access is denied
Try SQL injection in input fields and API parameters
Ensure inputs are sanitized and injection attacks fail
Use a revoked API key to access public API
Confirm access is blocked
Simulate user from different organization accessing restricted data
Confirm organization access control prevents data leakage

title: Bulk AI translation queue processing with error recovery
description: Test that the background queue processes bulk AI translation jobs correctly including fallback to secondary providers, status tracking, error handling, and retry mechanisms.

steps.description: Submit a bulk translation job requesting AI translations
Confirm the job is queued and appears in the queue dashboard with pending status
Simulate primary AI provider failure during job processing
Verify fallback AI provider is invoked
Ensure job status updates to completed or failed accordingly
Trigger job retry for failed tasks
Confirm retry executes and updates job history

title: Analytics dashboard displays accurate real-time translation metrics
description: Check that the analytics dashboard correctly displays translation progress, user contributions, review turnaround times, and other relevant metrics with charts and visualizations.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the analytics dashboard of a project
Verify translation completion rates are displayed correctly
Check user contribution statistics match database records
Ensure review turnaround times and other metrics display accurate values
Validate graphs and charts load properly and update with real-time data

title: CLI authentication, translation synchronization, and error handling
description: Validate CLI tools authenticate via OAuth, synchronize translations correctly, and handle errors gracefully.

steps.description: Run CLI login command and complete OAuth flow
Confirm successful authentication and token storage
Run CLI sync command to synchronize local and remote translations
Verify translations are uploaded and downloaded correctly without data loss
Simulate network interruption during sync
Confirm CLI reports error and supports retry

title: UI components render correctly on different devices and browsers
description: Test that all UI components, including grids, dialogs, buttons, and notifications, render correctly and maintain accessibility compliance across various devices and browsers.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
Verify UI components render without visual defects
Open the application on mobile devices (iOS and Android)
Check UI responsiveness and layout adapt correctly
Use keyboard navigation and screen reader tools on UI components
Ensure accessibility compliance (ARIA roles, focus management)

title: Import translation keys from Figma with text node extraction
description: Verify the integration with Figma allows importing translation keys by extracting text nodes from design files accurately.

steps.description: Authenticate and connect to Figma account
Select a Figma design file for import
Start the import process
Verify translation keys are created from all text nodes
Check for error handling with invalid or empty Figma files
